title: Memoranda of Understanding (MOU) between Republic of Korea and Sri Lanka on further strengthening the bilateral relationship and to expand technical co-operation between the two countries
decision_details: - the  proposal made by Hon. (Mrs.) Pavithra Wanniarachchi, Minister of Power and Energy, to sign the above Memoranda of Understanding between the two countries, to further strengthen the bilateral relationship and to expand the technical co-operation between the two countries, was approved by the Cabinet.
